name: Extreme Space Car Drive
description:
Face the fear of death in this Extreme Space Car Drive and perform different 3d extreme car stunt on risky impossible tracks. Start a real impossible driving on risky curvy mega-ramp and do extreme car jump 3d to the edge of the sky in Extreme Space Car Drive game. You are driving this Extreme Space Car Drive game on extremely dangerous tracks 3d in the middle of blue sky and get a unique impossible driving experience.

Driving the crazy car on a simple tracks is very easy in other crazy offroad car driving games but this Extreme Space Car Drive game contain fascinating 3d tracks where impossible tracks drive is very difficult. Choose your impossible track car and enjoy the adventurous ride with beautiful scenery on massive heights of blue sky on monster impossible tracks.
Take a deep breath, tighten your seat belt and start risky arcade drive on real difficult tracks in this Extreme Space Car Drive game. Get real chance to become a well of death car stunt rider by climbing to the edge of sky with this stunt car 3d but don't fall down from the tracks otherwise mission will be failed. Risky ramps, hurdles,different flying helicopters .

Extreme Space Car Drive: Features:

Various sports impossible cars.
Challenging missions.
Amazing extreme impossible tracks and dangerous curvy turns.
Realistic game play.
Perform extreme stunts in mid-air.
Next generation 3d graphics.
